title: Farberware Wire Sponge Holder, Satin
description: This Wire Sponge Holder from Farberware keeps sponges and scrubbers organized right at the sink. The smart, open-wire design allows for better drying of sponges after use. Suction cups secure the holder in place. Made from durable, rust-resistant satin wires. Measures 5.5 x 2.5 x 2.5 inches. To clean, hand-wash with warm water and mild soap.
features: NEAT AND TIDY: keeps sponges and scrubbers organized right at the sink SMART DESIGN: open-wire construction allows for better drying SUCTION CUPS: secure the holder in place DURABLE: made from rust-resistant satin wires SIZE: 5.5 x 2.5 x 2.5 inches
